name: Candy Biotics
description:
You finally landed inside the cake, but you can't remember how you did it.
Infact you can't remember anything.
Maybe these happy cake folks can help ?

Candybiotic take place in a huge cake.
By exploring it you will visit beautiful landscapes like Blackcurrant Coulis, Candied Chestnuts or Banana filling...

Arrow Keys : Move
Space Keys : Inventory
X & C : Use activable items

The game will save your progress each time you go to the toilet. If you want to suicide because you're stuck and can't vomit anymore (???) just press the escape key to go back to the menu, then select "continue".
